bioghist.p: Solomon Bush (1752-1795) was born and died in Philadelphia. He was married to Nancy Ann Marshall. They had one son, Mathias Marshall Bush (b. 1792).

scopecontent.p: This is Solomon Bush's journal from 1789-1792, which contains medical observations and recipes, in addition to memoranda of his marriage and the birth of his son Mathias Marshall Bush (b. 1792). Entries describe ailments and their treatment. A number of the entries are notes from lectures given by Dr. John Hunter. Recipes include salves and purgatives, as well as formulas for stopping gangrene, treating deafness, dissolving gum, cleaning mahogany furniture, and other ailments and household tasks.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
